aggregated statisticswrite to SDC RPCwrite to SDC RPCaggregated statistics for DPMConsider the following best practices when you configure a pipeline to write aggregated statistics to an SDC RPC destination:
To avoid mixing statistics from different jobs, use a unique SDC RPC ID for each job.
Monitor the disk space where the Dev SDC RPC with Buffering origin in the system pipeline temporarily buffers the records to disk before passing the records to the next stage in the pipeline.
The Dev SDC RPC with Buffering origin in the system pipeline temporarily buffers the statistics to a queue on disk. If the system pipeline slows, the temporary location on disk might become full. The temporary statistics are written to the location specified in the java.io.tmpdir system property, to a file with the following name:sdc-fragments<file ID>.queueFile
